Augusta-Richmond_County.Richmond County School System: The Richmond County School System is an American public school system managed by the Richmond County Board of Education, which is required under Section 8 of Paragraph 2 of the Georgia Constitution, which requires that an elected school board oversee each school system. Local school board members are to “manage and control” every aspect of local public school operations. As elected constitutional officers of Georgia, the school board members are responsible for setting educational policies in Richmond County, employing school personnel, providing buildings and equipment, operating a transportation system, and disbursing school funds.
